question: Which two countries are connected by the "Mont Blanc Tunnel"?
explanation: The Mont Blanc Tunnel is an 11.611-kilometer long highway tunnel constructed between France and Italy from 1959 to 1965, under the Mont Blanc mountain in the Alps. It links Chamonix, Haute-Savoie, France with Courmayeur, Aosta Valley, Italy. It is one of the major trans-Alpine transport routes, particularly for Italy.
